question:
You have decided to leave your current employment. Write a letter to your employer. Include the following in your letter:
- Explain why you are writing
- Explain why you have decided to leave the company
- Tell your employer what you plan to do after leaving your present employment
text: I’m writing to you to inform you that I would like to resign from my position as Team Leader from your company. I had a wonderful experience here with the Jaypee family, but somehow I and my mom have decided to shift to Canada so have to leave this job within a month.

I applied for the Permanent Residency in Canada and finally I got the chance to shift there. I was preparing for the IELTS exam for a very long time and now my hard work has paid off now. After shifting to Canada I’ll be searching for a new job as our new life will begin.
I’ll be leaving after giving my 1 month notice period. I’ll put my best efforts for this last month of the company and will be needing your blessings so that I can have a better life there.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase finally. Consider adding a comma.
The word month doesn’t seem to fit this context. Consider replacing it with a different one.
It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
